item.body: It's about time to make my site mobile friendly

item.head: New Website

Beginning a new side business, tentatively named SwiftSoft LLC. Getting the first website on-line for
No Coast Strength and Conditioning
Expanding upon javascript, so I created Conway's Game of Life!
